verbs.description: [V: tomball] german christmas market tomball is getting into the swing of the holiday season with the recent german christmas market the event featured live bands dancers and over 150 vendors selling food and gifts tomball spokesman mike baxter said the festivities brought approximately 6 000 visitors this year the city anticipates about 7 500 visitors it has just gotten bigger and bigger every year he said mike baxter christmas market tomball texas
